description:
Haruna is a self-proclaimed `masou-shoujo` (a pun on the word `mahou shoujo`) from a magical world who wields a chainsaw named Mystletainn and battles demons known as Megalos.
After first encountering Ayumu following a fight with a demon, her magical powers are somehow absorbed by him.
As she tries to figure out this situation, she appoints Ayumu to fight the Megalos in her place and lives with him.
name: Haruna
